titles.title: Authorizing the use of the Capitol Grounds for the District of Columbia Special Olympics Law Enforcement Torch Run.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.
Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 111-34.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 24.

action.text: Ms. Edwards (MD) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 39.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management

bill.summary:
2/4/2009--Introduced.
Authorizes the use of the Capitol grounds for the 2009 District of Columbia Special Olympics Law Enforcement Torch Run on June 5, 2009.
